DOC.brief_summary: Design : prospective cohort study . Setting : Tertiary university-affiliated ART oncology center . Patients : 20 cancer survivor underwent ovarian transplantation frozen-thawed ovarian tissue , aim conceive . Interventions : Ovarian tissue cryopreservation ( OTCP ) transplantation , endocrine monitoring , IVF .
DOC.brief_title: Transplantation Frozen Thawed Ovarian Tissue High Reproductive Performance
DOC.detailed_description: Main Outcomes expect : Endocrine profile IVF result , pregnancy rate follow transplantation ovarian tissue live-births rate follow transplantation ovarian tissue cancer disease recurrence
DOC.criteria: infertile patient store ovarian tissue preserve fertility prior potentially sterilize cancer treatment active disease , fertile patient post cancer treatment
